Processor package¶

Submodules¶

Processor.Processor module¶

Processor.Processor.define_model()[source]¶

Define the sequential layers of the CNN model

model: Sequential keras model

The CNN model

Processor.Processor.get_baseline(pp)[source]¶

Run the random forest baseline and calculate accuracy

ppPreprocessor

Used to get the original MNIST data

accuracy: boolean

The accuracy of the RF baseline

Processor.Processor.runProcessor(full=True)[source]¶

Run the CNN model and the RF and determines predictions and accuracies

fullboolean

Default value is True Determines if all the MNIST records should be considered or only a subset shall be used for testing.

acc_baseline: float

The accuracy of the RF baseline

acc_CNN: float

The accuracy of the CNN model

y_test: numpy.ndarray

The ground truth test labels

y_pred: numpy.ndarray

The predicted test labels
